com.facebook.buck.io

Class ProjectFilesystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.io.ProjectFilesystem

  • public class ProjectFilesystem
extends java.lang.Object
    An injectable service for interacting with the filesystem relative to the project root.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ProjectFilesystem.CopySourceMode
      Controls the behavior of how the source should be treated when copying.
      static class  ProjectFilesystem.PathOrGlobMatcher

      There should only be one ProjectFilesystem created per process.

      • getPathRelativeToProjectRoot

        public Optional<java.nio.file.Path> getPathRelativeToProjectRoot(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Parameters:
        path - Absolute path or path relative to the project root.
        Returns:
        If path is relative, it is returned. If it is absolute and is inside the project root, it is relativized to the project root and returned. Otherwise an absent value is returned.

      • getPathForRelativeExistingPath

        public java.nio.file.Path getPathForRelativeExistingPath(java.nio.file.Path pathRelativeToProjectRoot)
        As getPathForRelativePath(java.nio.file.Path), but with the added twist that the existence of the path is checked before returning.

      • readFirstLine

        public Optional<java.lang.String> readFirstLine(java.lang.String pathRelativeToProjectRoot)
        Attempts to read the first line of the file specified by the relative path. If the file does not exist, is empty, or encounters an error while being read, Optional.absent() is returned. Otherwise, an Optional with the first line of the file will be returned. // @deprecated PRefero operation on Paths directly, replaced by readFirstLine(java.nio.file.Path)

      • readFirstLine

        public Optional<java.lang.String> readFirstLine(java.nio.file.Path pathRelativeToProjectRoot)
        Attempts to read the first line of the file specified by the relative path. If the file does not exist, is empty, or encounters an error while being read, Optional.absent() is returned. Otherwise, an Optional with the first line of the file will be returned.

      • readFirstLineFromFile

        public Optional<java.lang.String> readFirstLineFromFile(java.nio.file.Path file)
        Attempts to read the first line of the specified file. If the file does not exist, is empty, or encounters an error while being read, Optional.absent() is returned. Otherwise, an Optional with the first line of the file will be returned.

             java.nio.file.Path out)
               throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createZip

        public void createZip(java.util.Collection<java.nio.file.Path> pathsToIncludeInZip,
             java.nio.file.Path out,
             ImmutableMap<java.nio.file.Path,java.lang.String> additionalFileContents)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Similar to createZip(Collection, Path), but also takes a list of additional files to write in the zip, including their contents, as a map. It's assumed only paths that should not be ignored are passed to this method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
